title: In what way do you find solace? - Quora

response.answer_text: Praying and giving it to God. I think frankly, I look at life forward like I have the ability to change things.I look at the past as a means to build me, and that it was fated to happen. To paraphrase Bob Dylan, there’s only two people you have to be worried about being dishonest with, yourself and God. But that can stress individuals out.
